info.abstract:
[Behaviour] Execute a bit reduction operation on blocks of count bits.
[Parameters] - input data type : not used. - output data type : not used. - measure : input measure. - count : aggregation block size. - operator : type of operation. -- 'INVALID_BIT_OP' : invalid -- 'OPH_BIT_AND' : bitwise AND (default) -- 'OPH_BIT_OR' : bitwise OR -- 'OPH_BIT_XOR' : bitwise XOR -- 'OPH_BIT_NAND' : bitwise NAND -- 'OPH_BIT_NOR' : bitwise NOR -- 'OPH_BIT_XNOR' : bitwise XNOR -- 'OPH_BIT_GREATER_THAN' : > -- 'OPH_BIT_GREATER_OR_EQUAL_TO' : >= -- 'OPH_BIT_LESS_THAN' : < -- 'OPH_BIT_LESS_OR_EQUAL_TO' : <=
[Return type] Bit-array.
[Examples] OR between all bits in 16-bit groups of bit-measures. oph_bit_reduce('','',bit_measure,'OPH_BIT_OR',16)
